body_content.explanation: an occasion when actors who are being considered for particular parts in a film, television programme, etc. read some of the script together, to see if they work well together and seem to have chemistry (= the quality of understanding and feeling attracted or friendly towards each other):
examples: The director was instantly struck by the connection between the two stars at the chemistry read.
The purpose of a chemistry read is to see how you instinctively relate to and work with the other actor.
